com.engine.graphics

Class AnimationSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engine.graphics.AnimationSet

  • public class AnimationSet
extends java.lang.Object

    AnimationSet

    An animation set is a set of animations combined into a single array for ease of use.
    Author:
    Ryan Hochmuth

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnimationSet(int size)
      Create a new animation set with the given initial size.
